channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for ND
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for ND

item.title: Report E-2023030420
item.description:
Report E-2023030420

Identified by scraper @ 2023-04-03T18:11:00+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-03-02
  • City: WEST FARGO
  • State: ND
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: xpo logistics
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading the warehouse crew accidentally put a forklift fork into one case of insecticide (un3352) and released 1 gallon of product from one of the inner poly 2.5 gallon jugs. Contractors were dispatched for the containment and cleanup of the release.
